title: Hour 1 - Warren Moon
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Warren Moon
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Colin wonders if the Dallas Cowboys are indeed an elite team after they were manhandled through much of their game against the depleted Arizona Cardinals. Also, reflecting on the Los Angeles Rams' win over the Baltimore Ravens, Colin forgives the quarterbacks who have a high ceiling but make a few mistakes while winning. Finally, Hall of Fame NFL quarterback Warren Moon joins The Herd to offer insight on recent NFL quarterback play and the playoff picture taking shape. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
